Articles.Content:
Hola, tengo un problema con el elemento de construccio Cofia, al colocar debaje de la zona donde quiero subir la cofia, la cofia no hace su funcion de crear una punta hacia arriba, no se como activarla para crearla, ayuda por favor

Quote

Hello, I have a problem with the construction element Cap, when placing below the area where I want to raise the cap, the cap does not do its job of creating an upward point, I don't know how to activate it to create it, please help

 

Edited November 23, 2020 by Vanamonde
Please post in English when not using the International subforums.

If you right-click the base of the fairing, a window will pop up. On the window will be a button that says "Build Fairing" (cofia construir, or something like that). That is how you activate it to begin.
I have tried right clicking and placing build, but nothing happens
This is in English, but the following video at the given time-stamp shows how a fairing is used:
and tried but nothing happens when I click build cofia

My memory is foggy, but wasn't there a bug in 1.10.0 that ruined modded fairings? It was supposed to be fixed in 1.10.1.

Dylan, are you on the latest version, and are you playing with mods?

If not, have you tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game? Sometimes things can break during updates.

It also often helps if you can show us screenshots or video of what you are trying to do. Especially if there is a language barrier

Yes, I play with mods, I had to be placing 1 by 1 again, since the mod causes the problem, it is the mod:         [1.10.1+] Restock - Revamping KSP's art (September 1)

Edited November 25, 2020 by Dylan jara
